Sugbo Eats Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam dapibus, ex in finibus fermentum, dolor. Make a Reservation Menu Menu Item Description Price
Heritage Table Colon Street, Cebu City 10:00 am - 9:00 pm Heritage Table offers a nostalgic journey through Cebu’s culinary past, serving traditional dishes that have been passed down through generations.
Fradel and Spies MJ Cuenco cor R Palma St, Cebu City 8:00 am - 9:00 pm Fradel and Spies Restaurant delights diners with a diverse menu featuring delectable satay, mouthwatering pizza, and more, all crafted to perfection.
Kasikas Fuente Osmeña Avenue, Cebu City 10:00 am - 10:00 pm Experience the best of Filipino and foreign cuisines at Kasikas Restaurant, located in the bustling streets of Fuente. Indulge in authentic flavors!
Sugbusog Grill House Parkmall, Mandaue City 6:00 pm - 11:00 pm Sugbusog Grill House offers authentic Cebuano grilled dishes. Known for its flavorful marinades and fresh seafood, it\'s the perfect place for a casual yet memorable dining experience.
Chef\’s Tasty Mactan Newtown, Lapu-lapu City 1:00 pm - 10:00 pm Chef\'s Tasty serves a delightful array of Filipino favorite foods, offering authentic flavors and heartwarming dishes that bring the taste of home to every meal."

Easy Convenient Enjoy
//Description Effortlessly book your favorite tables with Sugbo Eats. Dine your way - alfresco, indoors, or with special requests. Enjoy hassle-free booking confirmations and QR code check-ins. Finding the perfect ambiance for any occasion. Taste the flavors of Cebu. Log In Sign Up
